QueryResult.text: SELECT SEC_GROUP.ID GROUP_ID, SEC_GROUP.LANGUAGE_CODE, SEC_GROUP.GROUP_NAME, SEC_GROUP.DESCRIPTION, PROJECT.PROJECT_ID FROM CMN_SEC_GROUPS_V SEC_GROUP, CMN_SEC_GROUP_HIERARCHIES GRP_HIER, CLB_PROJECT_GROUP_KEYS PROJECT WHERE GRP_HIER.PARENT_GROUP_ID = PROJECT.PROJECT_MEMBERS_GROUP_ID AND GRP_HIER.GROUP_ID = SEC_GROUP.ID
